name: pipedream
title: Pipedream
description: Add, manage, and monitor your Pipedream workflows. Track errors, perform quick actions, and view workflow statuses directly from Raycast and your menu bar.
author: olekristianbe

commands.name: add-workflow
commands.title: Add Workflow
commands.subtitle: Pipedream
commands.description: Add a new Pipedream workflow to manage

commands.name: manage-workflows
commands.title: Manage Workflows
commands.subtitle: Pipedream
commands.description: View, manage, sort, and filter your saved Pipedream workflows

commands.name: menu-bar-workflows
commands.title: Show Workflow Status
commands.subtitle: Pipedream
commands.description: Display workflow status, error counts, and quick actions in the menu bar

preferences.name: PIPEDREAM_API_KEY
preferences.title: Pipedream API Key
preferences.description: Your Pipedream API key. For setup instructions, see the About This Extension section in preferences.
